menu.name: TGCI Options
menu.desc: Choose your TGCI settings in here!

menu.name: Filters
menu.desc: Sensitive to certain types of content? This contains filters to hide it

checkbox.name: Disable PC Manipulation?
checkbox.desc: This mod contains mechanics that will mess with aspects of your pc and could cause problems. Turn this on to disable it. We are not responsible for any damages that happen due to this option being on (its not designed to touch your files btw)

checkbox.name: Privacy Mode?
checkbox.desc: Removes your pc username, discord username, discord pfp, computer information anything that can personally identify you and replace it with rosebloom.

checkbox.name: Remove gore?
checkbox.desc: If your sensitive to gore this replaces all of it with zseven.png. Ruins the experience but its for accomadation

checkbox.name: Remove suicide topics?
checkbox.desc: If you are sensitive to suicidal content enable this to hide said content. You have been warned

menu.name: Performance
menu.desc: TGCI runnin slow? These toggles will improve performance

checkbox.name: Disable Shaders?
checkbox.desc: i call this the yin toggle. This turns off the shaders to help give you more performance

checkbox.name: Pure Speed
checkbox.desc: Remove camGame and all background assets to free up memory and performance. This is NOT RECOMMENDED!

menu.name: Customization
menu.desc: Customize the mod to your liking!

checkbox.name: Use old UI?
checkbox.desc: Replaces every custom menu with MMv2 original menus (Does not apply to gameplay)

checkbox.name: Disable the warning?
checkbox.desc: If checked will not warn you about this mods contents before you get into the game

checkbox.name: Hide Timebar?
checkbox.desc: Remove the timebar if you want just pure space

checkbox.name: Hide Healthbar?
checkbox.desc: Remove the healthbar if you want just pure space

choice.name: MENU BG
choice.desc: Change the BG on the main menu!
